p: The TDF Cohort was a retrospective cross-sectional study of archived samples from 175 HIV-infected patients enrolled in HIV treatment and care program between November 2006 and December 2007 and who had virologic failure. The purpose of the study was to determine HIV drug resistance patterns among patients who initiated first-line ART. The mean age was 38.1 (standard deviation [SD], 8.5) and 49% of the participants were female. The median CD4 cell count was 128 cells/μL (IQR, 169) and the median log viral load was 4.7 (IQR, 1.3).
